data.title: GABRIELE HERZOG bio exhibitions contact
data.text:
GABRIELE HERZOG

Born in Basel, Switzerland

Lives and works in Berlin, Germany

EDUCATION

MA University of the Arts London, UK 2007-2009

POSTGRADUATE COURSE, Central School of Art London, UK 1987/88

BA Schule für Gestaltung Basel, Switzerland 1982-1986
